Name: A task force to study city mental health resources and mental health bed capacity in hospitals and jails and issue a report and make recommendations for remedying any deficiencies.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a task force to study city mental health resources and mental health bed capacity in hospitals and jails and issue a report and make recommendations for remedying any deficiencies
BodyName: Committee on Mental Health and Substance Use

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Mental Health and Substance Use
